anchor: I lost my black leather bifold wallet yesterday evening around 6 PM near the main library building. It contains my driving license, two credit cards from Commercial Bank, approximately 5000 rupees in cash, and a small family photo. The wallet has brown stitching on the edges and shows some wear from regular use. If anyone has found it please contact me urgently as it has all my important documents.
positive: Found a black genuine leather wallet near the library entrance this morning. It is a bifold style wallet with brown stitching visible on the edges. Inside there are several cards including what appears to be a driving license and credit cards, some cash notes, and a family photograph. The wallet looks well-used and has some scratches on the surface. Owner can claim by describing the exact contents and providing identification.

anchor: Missing my brown leather wallet since this afternoon. I think I left it in the parking lot near Building A around 2 PM. The wallet contains my national ID card, university student card, ATM card from Bank of Ceylon, and about 3000 rupees. It also has some business cards and receipts from yesterday. The wallet has a metal clasp closure and is quite thick because of all the cards inside. Very important for me to get it back.
positive: Brown leather wallet discovered in the parking area near Building A this evening. It has a distinctive metal clasp closure and appears quite thick with multiple items inside. Found it containing an ID card, what looks like a student identification card, bank cards, several business cards, some receipts, and cash. The wallet is in good condition and clearly important to the owner. Keeping it safe until claimed with proper verification.

anchor: I lost my small red ladies purse wallet this morning at the shopping mall food court near the KFC counter. It is a bright red synthetic leather wallet with a zipper closure and has a floral pattern embossed on the front. Inside there is my national ID card, a small compact mirror, some lipstick, ATM cards from Commercial Bank and Bank of Ceylon, and approximately 3500 rupees in cash. There is also a handwritten note with a phone number inside. The wallet is quite new and in excellent condition. This is very important to me so please contact if found.
positive: Found a red colored ladies purse wallet at the shopping mall food court this afternoon. It was left near one of the fast food counters. The wallet is red synthetic leather material with zipper closure and has decorative floral embossing on the exterior. Contains various items including identification cards, makeup items like a mirror and lipstick, multiple bank ATM cards, cash money, and a small note with phone number written on it. The wallet appears relatively new and well-maintained. Keeping it secure for the rightful owner to claim.

anchor: Lost my expensive dark blue premium leather wallet near the beach area at Marine Drive yesterday sunset time. This is a very high quality genuine leather long wallet with RFID protection technology. Inside it contains passport-sized photos of my children, several international credit cards including Visa and Mastercard, an Emirates airline frequent flyer card, my business cards from my software company, and foreign currency including US dollars and Euros. The wallet has my initials A.P. embossed in gold letters on the bottom right corner. This is extremely important and valuable to me. Urgent please contact if you have found it.
positive: Premium quality dark blue leather wallet discovered near Marine Drive beach area this morning during a walk. It is a long-style wallet made of genuine leather and appears to be expensive with RFID protection features. The wallet contains several international credit and debit cards, airline loyalty cards, professional business cards, family photographs, and various foreign currency notes. There are gold embossed initials on one corner. This clearly belongs to a business professional and seems very important. Keeping it safely until owner provides proper identification and describes contents accurately.

anchor: I lost my black Samsung Galaxy mobile phone in the university canteen during lunch time today around 1 PM near the cashier payment counter. It is a Samsung Galaxy A52 model in black color with a dark blue protective case that has a card holder on the back. The phone has a small crack on the top right corner of the screen protector. The lock screen wallpaper is a photo of mountains. Phone was at about 60 percent battery when I lost it. There are important work files and family photos on it so I really need to get it back urgently. Please contact me if you have found it.
positive: Found a black Samsung Galaxy smartphone in the university canteen near the cashier counter this afternoon. It is in a dark blue protective case with a card slot on the back. The phone appears to be Galaxy A series model and has a cracked screen protector on the top corner area. The device still has battery power remaining and displays a mountain landscape as the lock screen background. Kept it safe at the canteen office. Owner should be able to describe specific details about the phone contents and unlock pattern to claim it.

anchor: Missing my white iPhone 12 since this morning near the main entrance gate of the building. It has a white silicone protective case with slightly yellowed edges from use. The phone has a tempered glass screen protector installed and there is a small dent on the bottom left corner of the case. Screen lock is enabled with face ID. The back of the case has a small sticker from a coffee shop. Phone was fully charged when I lost it this morning around 9 AM. This phone has all my work emails and important contacts so I desperately need to recover it. Reward offered for anyone who finds and returns it.
positive: White iPhone 12 found near the main entrance this morning around 9:30 AM. It is in a white protective silicone case that shows some usage with slightly discolored edges. The device has a screen protector applied and there is visible damage on one corner of the case. The phone is locked with security enabled and was nearly fully charged when found. There appears to be a sticker decoration on the case back. Currently keeping it at the security office. Owner must provide phone number for verification and describe specific case details to claim.

anchor: I lost my smartphone in the library study area on the third floor this afternoon between 3 to 4 PM. It is a Samsung Galaxy S21 in navy blue color without any case or cover. The phone back has some fingerprint smudges and minor scratches from daily use. Lock screen shows the time and date with a simple black wallpaper. The phone has a cracked screen protector that I haven't replaced yet. Battery was around 40 percent when I left it there accidentally while rushing to my next class. Contains important study notes and research materials that I need for my thesis work. Very worried about losing this data.
positive: Mobile phone discovered on a study table on library third floor this evening during closing rounds. It is a Samsung Galaxy smartphone in dark blue color without any protective case. The device back shows signs of regular use with some marks and scratches. Screen protector is damaged with cracks visible. The phone displays time and date on a dark lock screen background. Battery still has charge remaining. Device is secured at library main desk. Owner should provide phone number linked to device and describe unique identifiable features to collect it.

anchor: Lost my car keys in the parking lot this morning around 8 AM near parking slot B-15. It is a set of four keys on a metal keyring with a Toyota car logo keychain attached. The main car key is a modern Toyota smart key fob in black color, plus there are two house keys in silver and one small key that looks like a padlock key. The Toyota keychain has some scratches and wear from being in my pocket daily. One of the house keys has a green rubber grip cover on it. This is extremely urgent as I cannot access my car or home without these keys. Large reward for anyone who finds them.
positive: Set of car keys found on the parking lot ground this morning near the B section parking area. Consists of multiple keys on a metal ring with a branded Toyota keychain attachment showing the company logo. The main key appears to be a Toyota vehicle smart key remote in black plastic casing with visible wear marks. Also includes what look like residential door keys in metallic finish and a smaller key. One key has a colored rubber cover on the head. Keys are currently kept at parking lot security office waiting for owner to claim with description.

anchor: Missing my house keys since yesterday evening. I think I dropped them near the main security gate around 6 PM when I was entering the building. It is a bunch of five keys attached to a bright blue colored keyring chain. The keyring is made of soft blue rubber material and has slight damage on one edge. The keys include my apartment main door key which is gold colored, mailbox key, office desk key, and two other smaller keys. One of the keys has a number 305 written on a small label tag. Without these keys I cannot enter my apartment or access my office drawer. Please help me find them if you see them anywhere near the entrance area.
positive: Multiple keys with a blue colored keychain discovered near the security gate entrance this morning during patrol. The keyring is bright blue rubber material showing some wear and tear on the edges. Total of five different keys attached including what appears to be a residential door key in brass color, a small mailbox type key, office furniture keys, and others. One key has a numbered label tag attached to it. Keys are currently secured at the security guard post. Owner should be able to describe the specific number on the tag and the exact types of keys to claim them.

anchor: I lost my laptop backpack yesterday in the lecture hall LH-204 during the afternoon session around 2:30 PM. It is a black colored laptop backpack made by Targus brand with padded shoulder straps and multiple compartments. Inside the main compartment there is my Dell Latitude laptop computer, the laptop charger with cables, a wireless mouse, and some USB flash drives. The front pocket contains my notebook, pens, and calculator. Side pockets have my water bottle and earphones. The backpack has my name label attached to one strap. This laptop has my entire semester project work so it is absolutely critical that I recover it. Offering substantial reward for its safe return with all contents intact.
positive: Black laptop backpack found in lecture hall 204 this evening after classes ended. It is a Targus branded bag with cushioned straps and several storage sections. The main compartment contains a Dell business laptop computer, power adapter with charging cable, a computer mouse, and data storage devices. Front zipper pocket has academic notebook, writing instruments, and a scientific calculator inside. Side mesh pockets contain a water container and audio earphones. There is a name label visible on the bag strap. Bag and all contents are safely stored at the department office awaiting owner verification and collection.

anchor: My red colored backpack is missing since lunch time today from the cafeteria area. I left it on the chair when I went to get my food and when I came back after 10 minutes it was gone. It is a bright red backpack medium size with two main compartments and several smaller pockets. Inside there are my engineering textbooks including Thermodynamics, Fluid Mechanics, and Mathematics books, all with my name written inside the front cover. Also has my assignment papers, graph sheets, and a semester project report that is due next week. Front pocket has my calculator, geometry set, and colorful highlighter pens. This backpack and especially the project report inside are extremely important for my academics. Desperately need someone to return it if found.
positive: Red colored backpack discovered abandoned near the cafeteria seating area this afternoon. It is a bright red medium-sized bag with dual main compartments plus additional front pockets. Main section contains heavy engineering course textbooks on various technical subjects with handwritten name markings inside covers. Also includes academic assignment documents, technical drawing paper sheets, and what appears to be an important project documentation. Front compartment has a scientific calculator, mathematical instruments set, and colored marker pens for highlighting. All items appear to belong to an engineering student. Backpack is currently kept at cafeteria manager office for safekeeping until rightful owner claims it.

anchor: I lost my reading eyeglasses in the library study area on the second floor this morning around 11 AM. They are prescription glasses with black plastic rectangular frames and anti-reflective coated lenses. The frames are medium size and have a small logo on the temple arms. I was reading at desk number 25 and accidentally left them there when I went for a break. The glasses come with a black hard protective case that has some scratches on the outside. I am very nearsighted and cannot read or work properly without these glasses. They were prescribed just two months ago so are relatively new. Please contact me urgently if you have found them as I have no spare pair currently.
positive: Black frame eyeglasses found on a study desk on library second floor this afternoon. They are prescription spectacles with rectangular black plastic frames of medium dimensions and appear to have special lens coating that reduces glare. Small branding visible on the side arms of the frames. The glasses were found together with their black rigid protective carrying case which shows signs of daily use with surface scratches. Lenses appear to be for vision correction with significant magnification power. Glasses and case are currently held at library main information desk waiting for owner to collect them with proper description.

anchor: My brown tinted sunglasses are missing since yesterday afternoon from the swimming pool area. I left them on the bench near the pool entrance around 4 PM and forgot to take them when I left. They are designer sunglasses with brown gradient tinted lenses that are darker at the top and lighter at the bottom. The frames are brown tortoiseshell pattern plastic material. These were quite expensive sunglasses that I bought from an optical store and they have UV400 protection. The nose pads are adjustable and made of clear silicone. Brand name Ray-Ban is printed on the lens corner. These sunglasses are very important to me both sentimentally and financially. Will offer reward for their safe return.
positive: Brown tinted designer sunglasses discovered on a seating bench near the swimming pool entrance yesterday evening during facility closing. They feature gradient brown lenses with darker shading on top portion fading to lighter below. Frame design is brown tortoiseshell pattern in plastic material looking quite premium and expensive. Branded Ray-Ban marking visible on lens area. The sunglasses have adjustable nose pads in transparent material and overall appear to be high quality optical product with sun protection properties. Currently secured at pool facility reception desk for owner to identify and retrieve.

anchor: Lost my prescription eyeglasses in the men's restroom on the third floor of the main building this afternoon between 2 to 3 PM. They are my daily wear glasses with metallic silver wire frames that are quite thin and lightweight. The lenses are high index prescription lenses for both nearsightedness and astigmatism so they look relatively thin despite strong power. The frames have small nose pads and spring hinges on the temples for comfortable fit. I took them off to wash my face and left them on the sink counter by accident. Without these glasses everything is blurry and I cannot drive or work on computer. Had them for over a year so they fit perfectly. Desperately need to find them soon.
positive: Eyeglasses with prescription lenses found in the men's bathroom on third floor this afternoon on the washbasin counter area. They feature thin metallic silver colored wire frames that are lightweight design. The lenses are prescription optical lenses appearing to be high-index type for vision correction and look relatively slim. Frames have small cushioned nose pads and flexible spring-loaded hinges on the temple arms. These appear to be someone's regular daily use glasses based on the fit adjustments and slight wear patterns. Glasses are being kept at building administration office. Owner should describe their prescription type and frame specifications to claim them.

anchor: I lost my red folding umbrella at the main bus stop yesterday evening around 6:30 PM during rush hour. It is a compact folding umbrella in bright red color that folds into three sections and comes with a matching red fabric sleeve cover. The umbrella handle is made of black curved plastic for comfortable grip. When opened it has a diameter of about 90 centimeters providing good coverage. The fabric is water-resistant polyester material. There is a small velcro strap attached to keep it folded neatly. I must have left it leaning against the bus stop pole when my bus arrived and I was in a hurry. It has been my trusted umbrella for two years so I would really like to get it back if someone picked it up.
positive: Red colored folding umbrella found at the main bus stand this morning during cleaning. It is a compact collapsible design in bright red shade that folds in multiple sections. Comes with a matching red protective fabric sleeve. Handle is curved black plastic material for easy holding. The umbrella appears to be good quality with water-resistant fabric covering a wire frame structure. Has a velcro fastening strap to secure when folded. Umbrella is in good working condition showing normal signs of regular use over time. Currently kept at bus stop security booth for owner to identify and collect.

anchor: Missing my large black umbrella since this morning from near the main entrance gate. It is a big automatic umbrella in solid black color with an automatic open and close button mechanism. The shaft is made of strong metal and extends to about 85 centimeters length when opened. Handle is made of rubberized material with anti-slip grip texture. The umbrella canopy is quite large providing excellent rain protection for two people easily. It has silver colored metal tips on all the rib ends. The automatic mechanism makes a distinct clicking sound when operating. This was a gift umbrella so has some sentimental value besides being very practical and sturdy for heavy rain. Hope someone has found and kept it safe.
positive: Big black umbrella discovered near the main gate entrance this morning. It is a large automatic open and close type umbrella in solid black color with push button mechanism for operation. Constructed with metal shaft and framework extending to full length when deployed. Rubberized non-slip handle provides comfortable grip. The canopy size is quite substantial offering wide rain coverage area. Metal protective tips visible on the structural rib ends. The automatic opening closing mechanism functions properly with characteristic click sound. This appears to be a high-quality durable umbrella. Currently stored at main reception area awaiting rightful owner to claim it.

anchor: I lost my blue stainless steel water bottle in the gym fitness center yesterday evening around 7 PM. It is a double-walled insulated water bottle in matte blue color that keeps drinks cold for hours. The bottle capacity is 750 milliliters and has measurement markings on the side. The cap is a screw-on type with a flip-up spout for easy drinking. There are three stickers on the bottle - one from a hiking club, one motivational quote sticker, and one university logo. The bottom has a few dents from being dropped in the past. The bottle is quite important to me as I use it daily for workouts and staying hydrated. It was left near the treadmill area when I was in a hurry to leave.
positive: Blue stainless steel water bottle found at the gym near the cardio equipment section this morning. It is an insulated thermal bottle in matte finish blue color designed to maintain beverage temperature. Appears to be medium large size with volume measurement markings visible on the exterior. Screw cap with flip drinking spout mechanism. The bottle has several adhesive stickers applied including club memberships and motivational text. Shows minor impact damage dents on the base area from previous drops. Bottle is currently kept at gym front desk lost and found section for owner retrieval with identification.

anchor: Lost my Sony wireless Bluetooth headphones in the library second floor study area this afternoon around 3 PM. They are Sony WH-1000XM4 over-ear headphones in black color with active noise cancellation feature. The headphones come in a black hard shell carrying case with zipper closure. Inside the case there is also the USB charging cable and an airplane adapter. The headphones are foldable and have my name label sticker on the inside of the headband. The ear cushions are soft leather padding. Battery was around 50 percent charged when I lost them. These are expensive premium headphones that I use for studying and music so I really need to recover them. They cost me nearly 50000 rupees.
positive: Sony wireless headphones found in the library study area on second floor this evening. They are black over-ear style noise cancelling Bluetooth headphones model WH-1000XM4. Come stored in a rigid black protective carrying case with zip closure containing the headphones plus charging cable and audio accessories. Headphones have foldable design with cushioned ear pads in leather-like material. There is a name label visible inside the headband area. Device appears to have partial battery charge remaining. These are clearly high-end expensive audio equipment. Currently secured at library circulation desk awaiting owner verification and collection.

anchor: My white wired earphones are missing since this morning from the university canteen. I left them on the table near the window around 9 AM when I went to get my breakfast. They are basic white colored in-ear earphones with a 3.5mm audio jack connector. The cable is about 1.2 meters long and is slightly tangled as usual. The earphones have small rubber ear tips in medium size. There is a small inline microphone and remote control on the right side cable for answering calls and volume control. One of the ear buds has a tiny crack on the outer plastic but they still work perfectly fine. Had these earphones for about six months and they fit my ears comfortably so I prefer these over other models.
positive: White wired earphones discovered on a table in the canteen near window seating this afternoon. They are standard in-ear style earbuds in white color with traditional 3.5mm headphone jack plug. Cable length appears to be standard meter plus with some twisting in the wire from use. Rubber ear tips installed in middle size. Features inline microphone control unit on one side of the cable for phone calls and volume adjustment. Minor damage visible on one earbud housing but appears functional. Earphones are kept at canteen counter for owner to identify and collect.

anchor: I lost my wristwatch in the men's restroom on the first floor this afternoon around 2 PM. It is a Casio silver colored metal watch with a stainless steel bracelet strap and analog-digital display showing both traditional clock hands and digital numbers. The watch face is round with a date window at the 3 o'clock position. The metal bracelet has some scratches from daily wear over the past two years. Watch is water resistant up to 50 meters. This watch was a gift from my father so it has sentimental value beyond its monetary worth. I must have taken it off while washing my hands and left it on the counter beside the sink. Please contact me if you have found it.
positive: Silver colored wristwatch found in the first floor men's restroom on the washbasin counter this afternoon. It is a Casio brand watch with metal stainless steel bracelet style band showing signs of regular wear. Features combined analog and digital display face with both clock hands and digital numbers visible. Has date indicator window on the dial face. Metal band and case show normal usage scratches. Watch appears to be water resistant model. Currently being kept at building security office for rightful owner to claim with description and verification.

anchor: My black smart watch is missing since this morning from the gym locker area around 7:30 AM. It is an Apple Watch Series 7 in midnight black aluminum case with a black sport band made of fluoroelastomer material. The watch face was set to display time, date, heart rate and step count in a modular layout. There is a small scratch on the top right corner of the screen from when I accidentally hit it last month. The watch was at about 60 percent battery charge. All my fitness tracking data and health information is stored on this device so it is very important to me. The watch is paired with my iPhone so hopefully findable if someone honest picks it up. Will offer reward for its safe return.
positive: Black smart watch discovered near the gym entrance locker rooms this morning. It appears to be an Apple Watch model in dark colored aluminum casing with black rubber sport strap. The digital display shows various information including time, date and health metrics in a grid layout. Minor screen damage visible on upper right area of the display glass. Device still has significant battery charge remaining. This is clearly an expensive fitness tracking wearable with personal health data. Watch is secured at gym front desk. Owner must provide device serial number and describe linked iPhone details to claim it.

anchor: I lost my expensive gold wristwatch yesterday evening at the hotel banquet hall during a wedding reception around 8 PM. It is a luxury dress watch with gold-plated case and brown genuine leather strap with butterfly clasp. The watch face is cream colored with Roman numeral hour markers and three sub-dials for chronograph functions. Brand name is Citizen Eco-Drive which means it is solar powered and doesn't need battery replacement. The leather strap has developed a nice patina from two years of regular wear. This watch was purchased for my promotion celebration and cost approximately 85000 rupees so has significant monetary and emotional value to me. May have slipped off my wrist while dancing. Large reward offered for whoever finds and returns it.
positive: Luxury gold-colored wristwatch found in the hotel ballroom after wedding event yesterday night. It features gold plated metal case with brown genuine leather strap using fold-over butterfly closure mechanism. Dial face is cream shade with Roman numeral time indicators and multiple smaller dials for additional timing functions. Identified as Citizen Eco-Drive model which operates on solar charging technology. Leather band shows attractive aging patina from regular use. This is clearly an expensive high-end timepiece of significant value. Watch is being kept in hotel manager's safe. Owner should provide purchase documentation and describe specific chronograph features to recover it.
